com.scriptbasic.interfaces

Interface Factory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFactory, BasicFactory, GenericFactory

    public interface Factory
    Generic factory interface to create and get objects, as factories do.
    Author:
    Peter Verhas

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clean()
      Clean the factory.
      <T extends FactoryManaged> 
      void      		 create(java.lang.Class<T> interf4ce, java.lang.Class<? extends T> cl4ss)
      Call this method to create or replace an instance of the class defined by the interface interf4ce.
      <T extends FactoryManaged> 
      T      		 get(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
      Get an instance of the interface.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        <T extends FactoryManaged> void create(java.lang.Class<T> interf4ce,
                                     java.lang.Class<? extends T> cl4ss)
        Call this method to create or replace an instance of the class defined by the interface interf4ce. The object will be created calling the default constructor of the class cl4ss.

        If the class can not be instantiated then the implementation will throw BasicInterpreterInternalError.

        To avoid other code to create instance of the class out of the Factory the class should have only one default constructor and it should not be public. If the class has public constructor or has more than one constructors the method will throw BasicInterpreterInternalError

        See also FactoryManaged

        Parameters:
        interf4ce - the interface that will be used in subsequent calls to get(Class). Note that this is an error to pass a class that is not an interface and implementations may throw BasicInterpreterInternalError in such a case.
        cl4ss - the class that represents the interface. An instance of this class will be created by the factory.

      • get

        <T extends FactoryManaged> T get(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
        Get an instance of the interface. Some of the implementation define the class that implements the interface and if there was no preceding call to create(Class, Class) then instantiate the class.
        Parameters:
        klass - the interface. It is an error to pass a class that is not an interface. In that case the implementation may throw BasicInterpreterInternalError.
        Returns:
        the instance implementing the interface.

      • clean

        void clean()
        Clean the factory. Remove all references to the objects that were created by the factory.

        When the factory creates thread singletons (thread local instances) then this is important to call this method to release the objects before the thread finishes.
